snippet: After being left off the World Cup roster this summer, Landon Donovan put aside tension with the U.S. men’s national team and played the final game of his 15-year international career, a friendly match against Ecuador.
abstract: Landon Donovan, face of American soccer, sets aside tension with United States national team coach Jurgen Klinsmann after being left off the 2014 World Cup roster, and plays in the final game of his 15-year international career; receives proper farewell in friendly match against Ecuador.
lead_paragraph: After being left off the World Cup roster this summer, Landon Donovan put aside tension with the U.S. men’s national team and played the final game of his 15-year international career, a friendly match against Ecuador.

headline.seo: Landon Donovan Plays Last Game for U.S. Men's National Team
headline.main: Proper Farewell, Despite Potential for Awkwardness
headline.print_headline: Proper Farewell, Despite Potential for Awkwardness
